name: Fuel Makes You Heavy
description:
Oh no! You have accidentally flown directly into a bustling blimp airway! Maneuver your airplane around to avoid crashing and collect fuel to keep flying. But remember, fuel makes you heavy ;) 

Created for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 with the theme "Less is More". This is my first solo game jam entry. The game was conceptualized and created within a 7 day period. I made all the artwork and code, however the music and sounds were obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com.

Thanks for playing!
